question: Could you tell me what is classed as the beard is it only the hair coming from your side burns or the hair on your cheek aswell
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The hair on your cheek is not part of the beard. The hair from your side burns from where the cheek bone commences will form part of your beard.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
